questions_and_notes: Can we use time-mean data here? Why not?
specific_issues: 7:Deprecate? Eliminate one of 'point' or 'mean' variable options.
8:Deprecate? Only 3 groups contributed this variable in CMIP6.
comment: The surface sensible heat flux, also called turbulent heat flux, is the exchange of heat between the surface and the air by motion of air.
